ygData.subject: Re: Question for Befallen Buffs
ygData.msgSnippet: Befallen is wild.... I haven t yet figured out the Troll SK for the BBC (and I ve gotten about 5 BBC s  between me and parties I ve been in). SK will spawn
ygData.messageBody:
Befallen is wild.... I haven't yet figured out the Troll SK for the BBC (and
I've gotten about 5 BBC's between me and parties I've been in). SK will
spawn anywhere form 30 minutes to 6 hours.... I seen him spawn 30 minutes
after we killed him once, 2 BBCs in 30 minutes is nice... And, he hadden't
spawned more than once in 10 hours that entire day. The line is supposed to
be the spikes. Don't pass the spikes if you can help it.

The Thurg robes necro will spawn in a pattern. On the spot that she spawns,
spawns ghouls, necros, and the priest (take some firepower in for the
priest). She will NOT spawn (and the others will) if your past the last
ledge and actually in the room. You need to be atleast on the last
step/ledge going into the room. My guess, is that robes are possible every
30 or 40 minutes if done right.

-Zantaer, Fennin Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Jesper.Sallander@...
[mailto:Jesper.Sallander@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 10:55 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] Question for Befallen Buffs


From: Jesper.Sallander@...

Hi all. I have a question or two about the basement of Befallen...

We went down in hopes of getting a BBC for our Pally last night. We were
there for two hours or so, and never saw the SK. We were told that there is
a "spawn line", ie, don't cross it or the SK will not spawn. Is this the
case? If so, is that line at the end of the tunnel? Or inside the room?
It was fairly frustrating. Also, there was another group there camping for
the Robes, and I never saw that Theor..they...whatever guy that is supposed
to drop the robes. Does the same thing apply for him?

Lastly..how often would you say the SK would normally spawn? Every 1/2
hour? Hour? 2 hours? I probably will not return to Befallen, unless it is
with my Paladin with the objective of getting that BBC for him....so the
info would be appreciated. That place is just swarming with DE's, and it
makes my dwarven skin crawl.

Thanks.

Dameat
14th Level Dwarven Cleric (AND Master Brewer)
Rodcet Nife
